name: BlackWhite
description:
SURVIVE FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN!

A fast pace arcade shooter that will test your skills, coordination and visual perception. The longer you survive the harder it gets.

Change the background colour from black or white to see you your enemies, pick up upgrades and wreak havoc.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
RMB - Shoot
LMB - change to black or white.

Music:
Jamie Nord
Gaden Rhoss
